animation.name: Bitcoinal
animation.description: Bitcoinal includes various applications, such as statistics, tweets, tools and games

animation.name: Tx Street
animation.description: TxStreet is a live transaction and mempool visualizer featuring Bitcoin. When a new transaction is broadcasted to the network, a person appears and attempts to board a bus in real time

animation.name: Bitfeed
animation.description: On a typical day, the Bitcoin network confirms around 300,000 transactions by mining an average of 144 blocks. Bitfeed attempts to visualise this flow of information

animation.name: Bitcoin City
animation.description: Each city is a bitcoin transaction, on the road to the blockchain
